name: Supervillain Tooth Booth - The Anti Hero Evil Comic Book Dentist Adventure Free
name_original: Supervillain Tooth Booth - The Anti Hero Evil Comic Book Dentist Adventure Free
description:
4 Evil Super Villains visit the dentist in this fantastic dentist adventure!
You play the dentist who must attend to the teeth of these Super Villains...

Featuring;

4 Super Villains Ready For The Drill!
Change Teeth Colors!
Add Styling Stickers To Teeth!
Change Teeth Shapes!
Realistic Dental Tools!
& Much More!

You see, even Super Villains visit the dentist!
